pageProduct.name: Plunkett Aloe Vera Gel 75g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Certifed organic Aloe Vera soothing gel. Soothes, cools and helps restore dry, damaged skin

Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera is extracted from Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice which contains vitamins, minerals and antioxidants. Aloe Vera, also known as 'Natures Medicine Plant' is renowned for its cooling, soothing and hydrating properties which restore dry and damaged skin. Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera Gel is easy to apply and readily absorbed. No artificial colours or fragrance

Suitable For: Suitable for use on sun and wind burn and other dry, problem, itchy irritated or damaged skin

Size: 75g

KEY FEATURES

• Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera contains no addded water, alcohol, petroleum, parabens or artificial colours or fragrance. Plunkett's is 99% pure - the closest thing to cutting the fresh aloe vera plant! Certified organic, so there are no pesticides, chemicals, fertilizers or toxins.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid the eye area. Store below 30°

Ingredients

Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Cold Pressed Leaf Juice*, Allantoin*, Carbomer, Disodium Edetate, Sodium Hydroxy Methylglycinate, Grapefruit Seed Extract* * Natural and/ or Organic. Does not contain any artificial fragrance or colour

Active Ingredients: Active Ingredients: Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Cold Pressed Leaf Juice

Directions

Apply liberally as often as required avoiding the eye area. Suitable for use on sun and wind burn and other dry, problem, itchy, irritated or damaged skin.
